title: ARCS Motivation-Based Nursing Education Microlearning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Smartphone-Based Learning Content Delivery, 10-Minute Modular Learning Sessions, 5 Times Weekly

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 80% weekly content completion rates following ARCS (Attention, Relevance, Confidence, Satisfaction) motivational strategies
Learners demonstrate over 90% accuracy in identifying core procedures in nursing skills simulation videos
Learners score over 70 points (out of 100) on academic self-efficacy surveys at course completion

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
